content: we will skip the lonely half_double_crochet s at the beginning and at the end of each petal repeat 12 times fpsc around the single_crochet which was made in the picot 6 double_crochet the 1st one will be made in the first puff stitch on the petal in the middle puff make 2 double_crochet 3ch slip stitch into the 2nd double_crochet we ve made a picot one more double_crochet in the same puff 6 double_crochet the last one will be made in the last puff stitch on the petal close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 petals of 6+3+6 double_crochet each and there s a picot in the middle of each petal magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #18 this round will be a bit similar to round #11 its only purpose will be to support the next rounds repeat 12 times make 1 fphdc around the fpsc from the previous round 6 chain made on the wrong side under your work single_crochet into the top of the middle puff from round #16 make it on the wrong side of your work 6 chain made on the wrong side under your work close the round with a slip_stitch we have 24 6ch-spaces made on the wrong side of the work round #19 repeat 12 times puff around the fphdc 2 chain 4 single_crochet into the 6ch-space 1 single_crochet into single_crochet 4 single_crochet into the next 6ch-space 2 chain close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 puff stitches separated by 2 chain on each side and with 9 single_crochet in between round #20 repeat 12 times 3 tc into the top of the puff stitch 1 tc and 3 double_crochet into the 2ch-space 3 single_crochet into the 4th 5th and 6th single_crochet from the group of 9 single_crochet s 3 double_crochet and 1 tc into the 2ch-space close the round with a slip_stitch and go with a slip_stitch to the middle tc on top of the puff remember how you pulled the loop at the end of round #1 pull the whole loop to the wrong side because you ll start with back post stitches in the next round we have 12 petals of 3 double_crochet + 5 tc + 3 double_crochet separated by 3 single_crochet round #21 this round will be very easy and boring every tc and double_crochet gets 1 bpdc each single_crochet gets 1 single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 petals of 11 bpdc separated by 3 single_crochet round #22 this round should start on the middle bpdc out of 11 bpdc make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height and repeat 12 times puff around the 6th bpdc the middle one out of 11 bpdc s magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com repeat 2 times 2 half_double_crochet into the next bpdc puff around the next bpdc 1 half_double_crochet into the next bpdc skip the 1st single_crochet make single_crochet into
